post.author: Henry
post.content:
제가 임시직으로 일하는 회사 홍콩아줌마가 회사그만두게 되어서 사람을 뽑습니다. 관심있으신분은 홈피를 참조하셔서, 직접 이력서를 보내보세요.

회사이름: SOCAN (www.socan.ca)


JOB POSTING

Information Technology

POSITION TITLE:                Programmer        
REPORTS TO:                Project Manager
LOCATION:                        Toronto
PAYBAND LEVEL:                6
SALARY RANGE:                $43,053 - $50,650

OVERALL ACCOUNTABILITY:        Develop, code and test applications from detailed specifications.  Work with User community and other IT team members to analyze problems, determine and test solutions.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
Primary responsibility will be enhancement and maintenance programming tasks for the MARIE system.  Under general direction, the applicant will document, develop, code, test, debug and implement new software or enhancements to existing software.  The applicant must be competent to work on complex programs with guidance.  The applicant will assist in the planning, analysis, estimation and documentation of requirements for system modification requests; develop and maintain program specifications; assist with user acceptance testing and the scheduling of tasks for a given period.

SKILLS & KNOWLEDGE REQUIRED:
·        Position requires post-secondary education in computer science/programming or an equivalent of related education and experience.
·        A demonstrated detailed proficiency and development experience is required in the following:
o        Natural Adabas, Construct, Predict
o        Unix
·        Well developed analytical, problem solving, organizational skills
·        Strong customer service orientation
·        Excellent verbal and written communication skills
·        Proficiency with the Microsoft Office suite of tools is expected
·        Ability to work under pressure to tight deadlines
·        Team player with good interpersonal skills
·        A demonstrated facility with problem/change management process

APPLICATION PROCEDURE:
Qualified applicants are invited to apply in writing to Human Resources – Toronto Office, and include a recent copy of your résumé.  

SELECTION:
Skills may be tested and selection will be based on factors such as past performance, previous related experience and alignment of aptitude, personal skills and attributes to those required to perform the job.  Only qualified applicants will be contacted for an interview.

DEADLINE:
Applications must be received in Human Resources by November 29, 2004.

PLEASE NOTE:
In this position if you opt for a 4-day week, your day off (either Monday or Friday) will be determined by your Manager in accordance with Information Technology business requirements. If you already work a 4-day workweek, you may be required to change your day off.
post.title: Internal Job Posting (Programmer)
